document_data.name: Mikkaalgensis
document_data.mainbody: '''Mikkaalgensis''', also known as the '''Harper Dragon''', was an male [[dragon aging|adult]] [[silver dragon]] who lived in [[Myth Drannor]] in [[Cormanthor]] in the 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Fighting as an ally of [[Cormanthyr]] in the [[Weeping War]], the Harper Dragon was slain in the twelfth campaign, known as the [[Yuirgate|Dragons' Last Dive]] on [[Kythorn 24]] in the {{YearlinkName|714}}. The dragons Mikkaalgensis, [[Uinnessivar]], and [[Qiminstiir]] were slain while destroying a ''[[gate]]'' in [[Aglarond]]'s [[Yuirwood]] to stop an invasion by [[mezzoloth]] soldiers of the [[Army of Darkness]].<ref>
